---
title: "Age-adjusted COVID-19 mortality rates for Brazilian municipalities"
---

![](images/unnamed-chunk-18-1.png)

This dataset present crude and age-adjusted COVID-19 mortality rates for Brazilian municipalities, from 2020 to 2022 per epidemiological weeks.

More details about the methodology are available at this [blog post](https://rfsaldanha.github.io/posts/std_br_covid_rates.html).
